mapper.select:
select o.id,o.order_type,o.order_code,o.commodity,ad.consignee_name,o.order_money,DATE_FORMAT(o.deal_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),o.order_status,ad.province,ad.city,ad.area,ad.detailAddress,o.shipping_detail from order_indent o,address ad where o.shipping_address_id = ad.id and o.staff_id = #{staffId}
and o.commodity like CONCAT('%',#{inputSelect},'%')
and o.order_code like CONCAT('%',#{inputSelect},'%')
and ad.consignee_name like CONCAT('%',#{inputSelect},'%')
and o.deal_time>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
and YEAR(o.deal_time)=YEAR(NOW())
and date_format(deal_time,'%Y')< year(NOW())
and o.order_status = #{status}
ORDER BY o.deal_time DESC
mapper.update: update order_indent set order_status = #{status} where order_code = #{orderCode}
